name: Space Friction
description:
Space Friction is a game about a space lizard named Tokashi who is exploring space! During his exploration he is targeted by Space Pirates! Help Tokashi fight off the Space Pirates!

Features:

  • Simple Controls - Controls de signed for mobile to allow full control of Tokashi's ship.
  • Endless Waves - Tokashi is being hunted by Space Pirates! Survive for as long as possible!
  • Color Palettes - Unlock 6 different color palettes to use in game!
  • Controller Support* - Take control of Tokashi's ship using a controller!
  • Customizable Keyboard Controls - Don't like the default controls? Change them!

*Most controllers are compatible.
